content.rendered:
Property Management Companies

Apply as a PMC on ClickyTour

Submit your company profile and coverage. After approval, your listing can appear in our PMC Directory.

⚡ Fast onboarding 🛡️ GDPR-friendly 📌 Saved to Directory
Start Support WhatsApp
1) Fill PMC profile

Coverage, tags, experience, managed properties, media.

2) Verify & submit

Turnstile + consent. Then we send to CRM.

3) Directory ID

We generate a PMC ID used by the directory/profile.

PMC Profile Submission

Company (public + contact)
Coverage Regions (multi) (public)
Place IDs are generated automatically (temporary) until Google autocomplete is added.
Service Tags (public)
PMC Card Fields (public)
Languages (multi) (public)
Property Types Managed (multi) (public)
Social Links (public)
Media & Presentation (public)
Consent
Need help? Visit Support or message us on WhatsApp.
Review & Submit

Quick verification blocks spam. Takes ~1 second.

After submitting you’ll be redirected to confirmation.

Need no-logo links/PDFs for private sharing? We’ll enable or explain the best option.
🔗 Sync & integrations
Calendar sync, channel manager, OTA connections, and preventing double bookings.
💬 Messaging & access
Help with guest/agent/service chat, role-based access, and account verification.
Quick links

Most requested

Jump to the most common owner actions and help pages.

Free Evaluation List Vacation Property List Real Estate Request a Service Plans & Pricing

If something is urgent (today check-in, payment issue, or lock/keys), choose Urgent in the form.

Help topics

Choose a topic

Click a topic to see quick guidance, then use the form if you still need help.

🏠 Listing & Photos
Editing details, updating galleries, changing prices, and improving presentation.
📅 Availability & Bookings
Calendar issues, blocked dates, reservations, cancellations, and policies.
💳 Payments & Payouts
Wallet/IBAN, payout status, invoices, and payment method troubleshooting.
🔗 Sync (Airbnb / Booking)
Prevent double bookings, connect OTAs, and manage multi-platform sync.
🧾 Reports & Accounting
Exports, reservation PDFs, expense tracking, accountant access (optional).
📣 Promotion & Agents
Enable agent visibility, share white-label links, campaigns, and ROI tracking.
How fast do you respond?

Typical replies are handled within business hours. Urgent issues are prioritized when you select Urgent and include your booking/property reference.

What should I include to get help faster?

Add your property ID/link, booking ID (if any), your email/phone, and a short description of what you tried. Screenshots are welcome.

Can I request a no-logo (white-label) link?

Yes. Select White-label / No Logo in the form topic and we’ll guide you to the correct share link or PDF option.

Send a request

Owner Support Request

Tell us what you need and we’ll route you to the right specialist.

Open Owners FAQ

By submitting, you agree we may contact you about this request. If you need a white-label link/PDF, mention it in the message.

Common fixes

Try these first

These solve the majority of owner issues in minutes.

My calendar is wrong / double bookings

Check if your OTA sync is active and that you have only one “source of truth” calendar. If using Multi-platform Sync, confirm your external calendars are connected correctly.

I need a no-logo (white-label) link fast

We can generate a private share link (no branding) so you can send it immediately via WhatsApp/email, or embed it on your site without revealing ClickyTour.

I can’t see payouts / wallet balance

Verify your payment method is added and your profile is complete. If you use per-property IBAN, confirm the correct property is selected.

I need help with services (cleaning, repairs, check-in)

Use “Request a Service” from the owner menu to match with nearby providers. If urgent, mention timing and exact location.

Contact Support Request a Service Plans & Pricing

Zapier / Kommo / Core sync

Keep destinationPlaceId as text input (no dropdown).

content.rendered:
Find Staff / Contractors

One place to connect Owners, Property Management Companies, and Service Providers with verified Job Seekers. Browse the directory, post requests, and apply in minutes.
Browse Directory Requests Board For Job Seekers

1) Choose your entry point

Pick the path that matches your role. Each role has a dedicated landing page (best UX + SEO).

🏠 Owners
Need staff for your property?
Create a request, browse job seekers, and contact candidates fast.
Open Owners Area Quick Request
🏢 PM Companies
Hiring for multiple properties?
Post requests, manage applications, and build your seasonal team.
Open PMC Area Quick Request
🧰 Providers
Need helpers or subcontractors?
Find people by destinationPlaceId and role category. Post a job request.
Open Providers Area Quick Request

2) Job seeker path

For Job Seekers
Apply to requests (quick or advanced), track your applications, and manage your visibility.
Open Job Seeker Area My Applications
Browse & Apply
See the Requests Board and apply in minutes. Use destinationPlaceId filters when needed.
Open Requests Board Browse Directory

3) Quick launch (optional prefill)

Use these fields to auto-build test URLs with destinationPlaceId, roleCategory, and optional title. (No dropdown: paste IDs directly.)

Tip: your existing templates support query strings like ?destinationPlaceId=..., &roleCategory=..., &title=.... This tool just builds the URLs for fast testing.

4) Admin shortcuts

🛡️ Admin
Job Seekers Moderation
Approve / Reject • Toggle public/private • Filter by destinationPlaceId.
Open Admin Job Seekers
🛡️ Admin
Requests Moderation
Moderate requests • filter by status, salary range/currency, destinationPlaceId, roleCategory.
Open Admin Requests

content.rendered:
Find Staff / Contractors • Providers (Businesses)

Post requests and hire local help—fast.

Find cleaners, technicians, runners, seasonal staff, and local contractors per destination. Use destinationPlaceId for location filtering and requestId for tracking.

Start here
Post a Quick Request → Advanced Request Browse Categories Browse Job Seeker Directory Open Requests Board
✅ Quick posting ✅ DestinationPlaceId filtering ✅ RequestId application tracking
Destination Place ID

Paste a destinationPlaceId. We’ll append it to Quick/Advanced/Categories/Directory/Board links.

Example: /find-staff-contractors-requests?destinationPlaceId=2001

Testing shortcuts

Use requestId to jump into details & applications quickly.

Open Request Detail → View Applications Request Detail (unlocked=1)
Candidate profile test
Job Seeker #101 Job Seeker #101 (with requestId)
Provider focus

Hire on demand

Post a request in minutes and start receiving applications.

Match by location

Use destinationPlaceId to keep staff relevant to your service area.

Track everything

Each request has a requestId so you can review applicants cleanly.

How it works
1

Choose destination

Set destinationPlaceId (city/area) so candidates match your location.

2

Post request

Quick Request for simple needs, Advanced Request for detailed jobs.

3

Review applicants

Open /request-applications?requestId=... to manage candidates.

FAQ
What is destinationPlaceId?

It’s the destination/location identifier used to filter requests and candidate results (no dropdown—paste the ID).

Where do I see applications?

Open /request-applications?requestId=... to see and manage all applicants for a request.

Do job seekers see my request publicly?

Yes—your request appears on the Requests Board and from the Request Detail page link.

Post a Quick Request → Support

content.rendered:
ClickyTour • Marketplace

Find Staff & Contractors — tourism & property, worldwide.

A focused marketplace for hospitality, rentals, PMCs, and tourism businesses. Browse job seeker profiles, view staff requests, and apply using destinationPlaceId.

Start here
Browse Job Seeker Directory → Browse Requests Board Post a Staff Request (Advanced)
Owners Quick Request PMC Quick Request Providers Quick Request

Admin shortcuts

Admin • Job Seekers Admin • Requests Admin • Applications
✅ Destination-based matching ✅ Seasonal + urgent hiring ✅ Tourism/property-only
Test with destinationPlaceId

Paste a destinationPlaceId to test filters. This will append it to the buttons (no dropdown).

Example: /find-staff-contractors-requests?destinationPlaceId=2001

Choose your path

Employers hire from the directory or post a request. Job seekers apply from the Requests Board.

For Property Owners → For PM Companies → For Businesses → I’m a Job Seeker →
🔒 Contact can be locked 🧾 CV support 📩 CRM-ready flow
Quick test links
Test Profile #101 Test Request #501 Profile Unlocked
Who this is for

Property Owners

Hire cleaners, check-in staff, maintenance, gardeners, drivers.

Owners landing →

Property Management Companies

Scale operations with seasonal teams and trusted contractors.

PMC landing →

Service Providers / Businesses

Find staff for hospitality, tours, events, and support services.

Business landing →

Job Seekers

Apply to requests in your destinations and build one reusable profile.

Job seeker landing →
How it works
For employers
1

Browse directory

Filter by roles, languages, availability, and destinationPlaceId.

2

Reveal contact (optional)

Contact info can be locked until login / lead creation.

3

Post requests

Create a request to attract candidates in your destinations.

Browse Directory → Post a Request (Advanced) Quick Request (Owners)
For job seekers
1

Browse jobs

Use filters, including destinationPlaceId, to find the right request.

2

Quick apply

Apply fast with requestId-based application forms.

3

Get contacted

Employers contact you via your preferred chat method.

Browse Requests → Test Quick Apply
FAQ
Why destinationPlaceId instead of dropdown regions?

It keeps destinations consistent worldwide and reusable across ClickyTour systems (rentals, services, staff marketplace).

Can contact info be hidden?

Yes. Profiles can show limited info until the user logs in or creates a lead (CRM flow). Use &unlocked=1 for testing.

How do job seekers apply?

From Requests Board → open Request Detail → Apply via quick or advanced application forms using ?requestId=.

Open Requests Board → Support

content.rendered:
Find Staff / Contractors • Job Seekers

Quick Application

Apply fast to Request #—. We’ll generate your Job Seeker ID on first submit and send everything to Zapier.

Loading…
← Back Open Request My Applications Dashboard

Your details

Tracking fields (UTM/GCLID/FBCLID/etc.) are captured automatically from the URL + browser context.

Request you’re applying to

Loading…

Zapier Hook

POST JSON to:
https://hooks.zapier.com/hooks/catch/14582531/uwxuedb/

Also saves to localStorage: ctJobApplications (for your My Applications page).

IP Address

Browser JS can’t reliably read IP. Zapier will receive the caller IP on the webhook request. (We send ipAddress empty.)

title.rendered: Vacation Rental single property Hotel + Hotel Room

content.rendered:
ClickyTour • Hotel

Hotel Name (DB: properties.title)

City / Region • Address (DB: properties.city, properties.state_or_region, properties.address)

👥 Up to 2 guests 🛡️ Flexible policy ⏰ Check-in 15:00
Choose a room Policies Location
Check availability

Prefill from URL: ?checkin=YYYY-MM-DD&checkout=YYYY-MM-DD&guests=2¤cy=EUR

From €120 / night (gross)

Pricing uses: properties.basic_night_gross / properties.weekend_night_gross and stay rules like min_stay_nights, max_stay_nights. [oai_citation:5‡Document from Drcris.pdf](sediment://file_00000000116471f7b47c0ff755ee19aa)

Need help? Share

About this hotel

(DB: properties.short_summary / properties.brief_description)

(DB: properties.description)

Choose your room

Rooms are stored as child records: properties.property_class = hotel_room and properties.parent_id = hotel.id. [oai_citation:6‡Document from Drcris.pdf](sediment://file_00000000116471f7b47c0ff755ee19aa)

Deluxe Double Room

Sleeps 2 • 24 m² • Non-smoking

🛏️ 1 bed 🛁 Private bath 📶 Wi-Fi
€140 / night (gross)

Policies come from properties.cancellation_policy and properties.house_rules. [oai_citation:7‡Document from Drcris.pdf](sediment://file_00000000116471f7b47c0ff755ee19aa) [oai_citation:8‡Document from Drcris.pdf](sediment://file_00000000116471f7b47c0ff755ee19aa)

Check dates → View policies

Extras & add-ons

Optional extras can be listed from property_extras (fee basis + amount + ordering window). [oai_citation:9‡Document from Drcris.pdf](sediment://file_00000000116471f7b47c0ff755ee19aa)

🍳 Breakfast

Per-person-day • €12 • Add at booking

🚗 Parking

Per-day • €8 • Subject to availability

Policies & rules

Cancellation

Uses properties.cancellation_policy enum (free_7_days / flexible / strict / non_refundable, etc.). [oai_citation:10‡Document from Drcris.pdf](sediment://file_00000000116471f7b47c0ff755ee19aa)

Pets & smoking

Uses properties.pets, properties.max_pets, properties.smoking_allowed. [oai_citation:11‡Document from Drcris.pdf](sediment://file_00000000116471f7b47c0ff755ee19aa)

Check-in / check-out

Uses property_instructions.check_in, check_out, key_collection_point, and instructions text. [oai_citation:12‡Document from Drcris.pdf](sediment://file_00000000116471f7b47c0ff755ee19aa)

content.rendered:
Guests • Support

Talk to an advisor

Tell us what you need and we’ll guide you to the best next step: vacation rentals, tours & activities, or real estate.

💬 Fast reply 🧭 Clear guidance 📌 Curated shortlist 🗺️ Worldwide
Support Center FAQ

Request a call / message

We’ll use your details only to reply and prepare your options.

✅ Request sent. Redirecting…

By sending, you agree we may contact you about this request. No spam.

What happens next

Step 1

We review your request

We confirm destination, timing, budget, and must-haves.

Step 2

We create a shortlist

Listings or proposals matched to your criteria.

Step 3

You choose the next step

Book, request details, schedule a viewing, or refine.

Explore destinations Request travel planning Browse long-term rentals

FAQ

How fast do you reply?

Depending on volume/timezone, usually within 1 business day.

Do you work worldwide?

Yes — destination is worldwide. Availability depends on inventory and partner coverage.

Can you help if I’m not sure what I want?

Yes. Select “Other / Not sure” and share any details you have.

content.rendered:
Guests • Real Estate

Rent long-term — worldwide

Search apartments, houses, villas, and rooms for monthly rent. Start with destination + budget, then refine in results (map + advanced filters).

🔑 Monthly rentals 🏙️ Apartments & houses 🗺️ Map results 🧾 Clear terms
Browse all long-term Request assistance

Quick search

Prefilled from homepage / shared links when parameters exist.

Search long-term How it works

Next step: results page opens with rentMode=monthly + your filters.

Browse by property type

Fast entry points into results — ideal for guests who already know what they want.

Popular destinations for monthly rent

Choose a destination to open results instantly (you can refine filters on the next page).

Explore all destinations Request a shortlist

Long-term rentals made simple

ClickyTour helps guests find long-term rentals with a clean search flow: choose destination, add budget, select property type, and refine results using map view and advanced filters. Depending on inventory, filters can include furnished/unfurnished, pets, parking, building type, floor, elevator, heating/cooling, internet, and distance to key points.

FAQ

Is this for monthly rent only?

This page is optimized for long-term (monthly) rentals. Short stays should use Vacation Rentals.

Where do filters apply?

This page collects quick filters and passes them into the results page, where the full filter set is available.

Can I request help instead?

Yes — use “Request assistance” for curated proposals and guidance.

content.rendered:
Guests • Real Estate

Browse real estate by property type

Pick a property category to see results instantly (with map + advanced filters). Works worldwide — destination first, then refine.

🧭 Destination pages 🔎 Advanced filters 🗺️ Map results 💬 Request assistance
Open Real Estate Search Request Assistance

Quick filter (optional)

These fields will prefill results when you choose a property type.

Search (any type) How it works

Tip: Choose a type below → we’ll add type=... automatically.

Choose a property type

Each tile links to the results page with prefilled intent + filters.

Find the right property faster

Start with a property category (apartment, house, villa, land, commercial) and a destination. Then refine results using advanced filters like price range, bedrooms, size, year built, amenities, view, distance, and more (depending on your data model).

Apartments

Ideal for city living, rentals, and lifestyle buyers.

Houses & Villas

Space, privacy, family needs, and premium features.

Land & Commercial

Development, long-term investment, and business opportunities.

Browse all listings Request a shortlist

FAQ

Does this work worldwide?

Yes — destinations and inventory can expand globally. The page structure stays the same.

What happens after I choose a property type?

You’ll go to the results page with prefilled filters (intent + destination + budget + bedrooms + type).

Can I request help instead of searching?

Yes — use “Request Assistance” to get curated proposals and support.

content.rendered:
Guests › Activities › By Destination
Activities by Destination

Choose where you’re going — then pick what you want to do.

Browse worldwide destinations, filter by activity style, or search directly. Your selection opens the Activities Results page with fields prefilled.

🌍 Worldwide ⚡ Instant confirm (where available) 🛡️ Clear cancellation rules
Browse all activities Prefilled from guest homepage via URL parameters.

Options

Tip: If your homepage uses destinationRegion, serviceCategory, serviceDate, adults, this page will still prefill correctly.

Browse

Destinations

Use region + activity style filters. Click a destination to open activities results prefilled.

0 destinations

Region

Activity style

You can select multiple styles (AND filter).

Popular

Browse by category

These set the category filter and open activities results. If you already picked a destination above, it will be included.

FAQ

Activities by destination

Where do results show after I search?

When you click a destination (or press “Search activities”), you go to the Activities Results page. That page shows the activities grid and (optional) map, with your destination and filters prefilled.

How does prefill work from the guest homepage?

If your guest homepage sends URL parameters like destination, date (or serviceDate), pax (or adults), and category (or serviceCategory), this page reads them automatically.

Can I browse without choosing a destination?

Yes — use “Browse all activities” or search with only a category/date. The results page can show worldwide options, then you refine by destination later.

Tours & activities worldwide — find the right experience

ClickyTour helps guests discover tours and activities worldwide, including city tours, boat trips, adventure experiences, food tastings, cultural visits, tickets, and transfers. Use destination, date, and traveler count to compare options quickly. Clear details and pricing help you decide confidently.

Search activities → Last-minute deals Support & policies

FAQ

Can I book tours and activities worldwide?

Yes. ClickyTour is designed for worldwide discovery—use destination search to explore cities and regions.

Do I need to select a date?

You can search without a date, but selecting one helps show availability and more accurate results.

Are transfers included?

Some experiences include pickup or transfers. Use the Transfers category, and check each activity’s included details.

How do I find family-friendly options?

Use category filters and read descriptions; many tours are suitable for families and small groups.

Ready to plan your day?

Search tours, activities, tickets and transfers worldwide.

ClickyTour helps guests find vacation rentals worldwide, including villas, apartments, holiday homes, houses, studios, and hotel rooms. Use destination search, dates, and guest count to compare stays quickly. Transparent pricing helps you understand the final cost before committing, while filters help you match the stay to your needs.

Search rentals → Last-minute deals Support & policies

How it works

Step 1

Search

Enter destination, dates, guests and stay mode (rentals / hotels).

Step 2

Compare

Use filters and sorting to narrow down quickly — see clear pricing.

Step 3

Book with confidence

Follow the booking steps or request help if you need proposals.

What guests say

“The filters made it easy to find a stay that actually matched our group and budget.”

— Guest traveler

“Loved having both rentals and hotel rooms in one place — fewer tabs, faster decision.”

— Weekend trip

“Transparent pricing helped us trust the booking — no surprises at checkout.”

— Family vacation

FAQ

Are vacation rentals available worldwide?

Yes. ClickyTour is designed for worldwide discovery. Use destination search to browse regions, cities, and popular areas.

Can I search hotel rooms too?

Yes. Select “Hotels & rooms” in the stay mode field (or use the quick chip). You can also search “All stays” to compare.

How are prices shown?

We aim for transparent pricing and clear rules so guests can understand costs before committing.

What if I need help planning?

You can request travel planning assistance or browse deals like last-minute, hot offers, and group deals.

Do you offer deals?

Yes. Check last-minute deals, hot offers, and group deals.

Ready to find your stay?

Search rentals worldwide — villas, apartments, houses, and hotel rooms.

Search rentals → Last-minute deals Support

content.rendered:
ClickyTour.com

One platform for rentals, real estate, and local services — built for every role.

List, promote, manage, and get paid with automated tools, transparent pricing, and white-label presentations.

Explore how it works Choose a role
What you get
⚙️ Role-based dashboards & automation
🧾 Transparent pricing & fee rules
🪪 White-label presentations & offers
💸 Fast, trackable payouts

How would you like to work with ClickyTour?

Choose a role to see the right quick form.

We’ll prefill the next step and match you instantly.

✅Automated tools
✅No hidden fees
✅Best rates logic
⚡Fast onboarding
🛡️Verified partners
💬Support when needed

Start here

Choose a role above (or in the mini-form) to see your next steps.

How it works

Step 1
Choose role

Switch the homepage to your path.

Step 2
Submit

List property/service or post a request.

Step 3
Automate

Use tools to manage & promote.

Step 4
Get results

Track earnings, leads, or next steps.

Automated tools for your role

Start with the basics, then select your role for tailored tools:

White-label presentations

Share offers as a link or PDF — with your branding or no branding.

  • Offer links for rentals, services, and real estate
  • 1-click PDF export
  • Perfect for agents, PMCs, and owners
See White-label Tools
Preview
🧩 Agent-branded template
🕶️ No-brand presentation
🔗 Shareable link
📄 PDF export

Transparent, fair, and simple

No hidden fees

Pricing rules are visible before you commit.

  • Clear subscription or commission logic (where applicable)
  • Optional add-ons are always marked as optional
  • Receipts + reporting in the dashboard
Best rates structure

Transparent net & gross pricing logic.

  • Guests see clear final prices
  • Agents may access net rates (when enabled)
  • Partners control pricing rules
Easy payouts

Track earnings and payout status.

  • Payout schedule explained in plain language
  • One place for earnings + invoices
  • Works across roles (partners & agents)

FAQ

Pick your role and start in minutes.

You’ll be guided to the right listing or request form.

Get Started How it works

title.rendered: Thank you! We’re working on your proposal

content.rendered:
🎉 Thank You!

We’ve received your request. Our team is now preparing your tailored vacation proposal.

What Happens Now?

  • ✅ A real human (not AI) is reviewing your request
  • ✅ We match you with the best available homes and local services
  • ✅ You’ll receive your proposal within 24 hours by email

Need to change something? Just reply to the email or contact us below.

In the Meantime, Explore More

🔍 Browse Experiences

Discover things to do in Greece

⭐ Premium Plan

Get VIP treatment & priority service

💬 Support

Contact us or ask a question

Follow us for travel tips, offers, and local insights:

📸 Instagram | 📘 Facebook
